body_html:
@hangwudy commands like -DUSE_FOO affect how the libraries are built. When installing the pre-built binaries all the code has already been built, so at this time no new features such as lmdb or leveldb or anything else can be added. It is impossible to pass any sort of build commands into a 'conda install' and have an effect. The pre-built binaries come with the most common 'default' configeration, but to get other functionality (such as lmdb) you will need to build from source.

Also, note that the package is now
conda install -c pytorch pytorch-nightly
